message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $12,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. I believe this product will bring you significant value.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $11,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,000. Can we discuss this further?
